textAfterTable: Kendrick allows five runs in loss to Cards | 06/22/2014 8:00 PM News Kyle Kendrick allowed five runs on eight hits over six innings in a loss to the Cardinals on Sunday. Rotoworld.com Impact Kendrick had pitched better in his previous two starts heading into Sunday, but the right-hander struggled against the middle of the Cardinals' order in the loss. The loss dropped his record to 3-7, and he owns a 4.20 ERA through 94 1/3 innings. He'll face the Braves on Friday. Kendrick outpitches Santana for third win | 06/17/2014 10:46 PM News Kyle Kendrick improved to 3-6, allowing two runs over seven innings as the Phillies defeated the Braves 5-2 on Tuesday. Rotoworld.com Impact Kendrick has quietly turned his season around. His ERA hovered in the low- to mid-4.00's for the last couple weeks, but Tuesday's outing lowered it to 3.97. He allowed six hits, walked one, and struck out six -- the most he's struck out in a start since April 13. Kendrick will face the Cardinals on the road in his next outing.
